title: Daily Reminder that Lulu is better than every other Yordle combined

replies.body:
Sorry, I can't hear you over my...

http://i.imgur.com/L04S7vh.gif?Noredirect

http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-zFm97YREBwY/Umd3fG2bCUI/AAAAAAAAOds/eiJcnyZ5TAM/s1600/bender-laughing.gif
btw, if you add ?Noredirect to the end of the URL that gif will post correctly. You need to add it from imgur files.

Last time I checked, I was the Yordle king. I DECLARE RUMBLE THE BEST YORDLE OF THEM ALL... (but you have to use the Super Galaxy Rumble skin).

http://media.giphy.com/media/AqeqMfmaaSPza/giphy.gif?Noredirect

I actually find Super Galaxy Rumble to have an obnoxious voice and undesirable sound effects.
http://imgur.com/6WFuuz8.gif?Noredirect

I think you simply don't understand how awesome he is. Just look at him standing in the wind, not even flinching.

http://24.media.tumblr.com/0a8c5e0d1bb8bae4159f3b09835900ee/tumblr_n30ki5NrPi1s5tqioo2_500.gif?Noredirect
https://media.giphy.com/media/JVagvSmdX5HNe/giphy.gif
https://img.pandawhale.com/58583-MythBusters-gif-I-reject-your-Ba7I.gif?Noredirect
http://suptg.thisisnotatrueending.com/archive/17605586/images/1327071539497.gif

http://media-cache-ec0.pinimg.com/736x/28/32/dc/2832dcf8e56214241844d82afa308606.jpg

Still going with Rumble.

There is nothing Rumble can do to compete with this. Nothing.
http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-pZsqy-6LAFw/VY39U5n9fCI/AAAAAAAABo8/wafKdWUc9fY/s1600/4%2BLaugh%2527.gif

Lulu is great, but she isn't
http://i.makeagif.com/media/5-18-2014/T24iW0.gif
great

Gnar begs to differ...

http://orig00.deviantart.net/fe95/f/2014/216/7/7/polu_2_by_oldlim-d7tn91e.jpg
http://i2.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/845/746/749.png

I don't like where this is going

It is the best, join us, you won't regret.
Friendshipping is best shipping.

[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-b5X69vREAg](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-b5X69vREAg)

Obligatory

Tristana is Best Yordle

Dragon Trainer Tristana

Destroys 

Super Galaxy Rumble
https://45.media.tumblr.com/8fd63c37f5fce5730252ab319218ff55/tumblr_nyrhn3BTr41um5xf9o1_400.gif
Wow…… that is the single most depressing thing I have ever seen in League of legends. And coming from a person who has seen AP Lucian mid.
The sweet tones of misery.
https://cdn.meme.am/instances/60375523.jpg
I thought Veigar was the best to you
A gentleman knows his place and has no quandaries in uplifting others; I have no issue in conceding superiority to another, especially one so deserving.
...not
https://33.media.tumblr.com/c406b0c772822afa735bf68bca0ea3fa/tumblr_mj1h9yip5F1rl1m5co3_500.gif
Lulu is just a **little** better.

http://i214.photobucket.com/albums/cc121/LuvOrlando37/Cute%20Animals/bunny.gif~original
Ok, you'll destroy us, but give us a **short** amount of time to warn our loved ones.

http://i.imgur.com/zaiBs6W.jpg

"I have tastes that aren't easily... pacified."
https://embed.gyazo.com/994ff3c3da58e6b5a77acf1988755eb1.jpg
{{champion:18}}.  *drops mic* come at me sushi.

Gnar approves of Lulu being the best modern yordle
http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/815/947/863.png

Gnar is still the best prehistoric yordle tho
I pref poppy! Poppy power
https://49.media.tumblr.com/c68cdffe531fd4bc9cd011bc9169fbbc/tumblr_nyca9iTx871rn12l8o1_250.gif

{{champion:45}} wants to destroy/conquer the world
{{champion:17}} mass murdering psychopath
{{champion:18}} blows thing up.
{{champion:68}} has the same shortness issue like veigar.
{{champion:32}} is not a yordle btw
{{champion:42}} reckless test pilot
{{champion:74}} crazy scientist.
{{champion:115}} crazy ivan.
{{champion:117}} pink sniffing hippy.
Actually, the new Shurima lore they added to {{champion:32}}  made the whole " is he a child or a yordle" thing cannon. All that IS known is that he is an ancient ruler of Shurima.

Daily reminder that daily reminders aren't daily reminders if you don't remind daily

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
Well that's silly. I didn't need a reminder, I already knew that.
{{champion:68}}

Only Yordle who could top her is this one (FYI its fan art):

http://orig15.deviantart.net/415c/f/2016/025/d/c/mini_lulu___new_clothes_by_yan531-d9pazc6.jpg http://orig07.deviantart.net/db07/f/2016/025/a/c/mini_lulu___new_friend_by_yan531-d9paznb.jpg

Its from [Yan531 on DevientArt](http://yan531.deviantart.com/).

Side note: I really wish I could understand the written language.
DT Trist > new Poppy > OS Teemo > Trist > Gnar > Lulu > SG Rumble > Heimer + Ziggs > Veigar.
http://img06.deviantart.net/9138/i/2013/259/b/0/yandere_lulu_by_msvioletmagpie-d6ldh7n.png?noredirect

http://i.imgur.com/95gucvF.jpg

Best ship <3
Not very tall competition there....
